#summary Transition Description

= Introduction =

A transition is when switching from one [Layout] to another, it will affect the behavior of the source


= Details =

So, you have several Layouts in place, and each one of them has multiple sources.  What you need is some sort of transition effect when switching from one [Layout] to another.

The Transition will take care of changing the opacity, starting or stopping the source, setting the new coordinates by increments to give the illusion that the source is disappearing, moving, or sliding out.

Also, it is useful to stop unnecessary video source when they are not needed.  For example, the Desktop source, you only want it to run when you want to display your desktop, otherwise, it's best to stop it to avoid high CPU Usage.
